metadata.title: CVE-2017-8849 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
smb4k before 2.0.1 allows local users to gain root privileges by leveragingfailure to verify arguments to the mount helper DBUS service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8849` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

smb4k - 2.1.0-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: smb4k package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.0-1').
